item.title: Creating and Running Containers
item.description: A container image is a binary file that follows a specific standard.

item.description: A container image is a binary file that follows a specific standard.

item.title: Distilled JRE Apps in Containers
item.description: The lab walks through a series of steps for distilling a container to its minimum to support your Java application.

item.title: Spring Boot to Kubernetes
item.description: The lab walks through a series of steps that go from a blank slate of no code to running a Spring Boot application on Kubernetes.
